Posts.Title: Poll - How old were you when dx with BC Times3 Minetta57

Posts.Content: Sassi wrote: I wanted to take a moment to say Thank you all! I do not post much but I am on here every day. I find my strength, comfort and a lot of knowledge from you incredibly amazing women! Thank you! Dx 6/21/2013, IDC, Stage IIB, ER+/PR+, HER2- Chemotherapy 7/5/2013 AC + T (Taxol) Surgery 3/5/2014 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel, Underarm/Axillary Surgery 3/14/2014 Lumpectomy: Right Dx 3/25/2014, IDC, 2cm, Stage IV, 25/27 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Chemotherapy 3/25/2014 Xeloda (capecitabine) Dx 5/15/2014, IDC, 2cm, Stage IV, 25/27 nodes, mets, ER-/PR-, HER2- Radiation Therapy 5/22/2014 Bone Chemotherapy 6/18/2014 Carboplatin (Paraplatin), Gemzar (gemcitabine) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hello and Thank you Sassi Aoibheann
